imdb.plot outline: Cortney & Bob head to snowy Mammoth, California where they meet their client, legendary skateboarder Tony Hawk, on the top of a mountain. Tony may be the master of vertical skateboarding, but his '70s ski lodge is woefully outdated and in desperate need of the Novogratz touch. The Novogratzes decide to give Tony a chic boutique resort feel and to emphasize family in the design.
imdb.title: Tony Hawk's Mammoth, California Living Room
akas: Tony Hawk's Mammoth, California Living Room (United States)
plot: Cortney & Bob head to snowy Mammoth, California where they meet their client, legendary skateboarder Tony Hawk, on the top of a mountain. Tony may be the master of vertical skateboarding, but his '70s ski lodge is woefully outdated and in desperate need of the Novogratz touch. The Novogratzes decide to give Tony a chic boutique resort feel and to emphasize family in the design.::Mike Muir
